prompt_notes: Original production-style prompt without explicit Main Summary instruction.
No explicit rule for bullet density or emotional preservation.

transcript_findings.notes: Collapsed CTA/Layout branches into one blob; no Main Summary.
Emotion acknowledged but ritual + slider ideas merged into a single bullet.
Failed to capture motif list; paraphrase bullets missing.

accepted_hypothesis: If we force explicit shape detection and require Main Summary + per-branch sections, the branching transcripts will stabilize.

prompt_notes: Added mandatory Main Summary whenever multiple storylines exist.
Section craft rule now enforces bullets for actionable ideas and preserves emotional context.
Language fidelity reminder moved near output rules to avoid hallucinated translations.

transcript_findings.notes: Sections aligned (CTA, Layout, Multi-clip) but layout copy slightly repetitive.
Emotional tone retained; slider call-to-action highlighted correctly.
Layering + motif modules appear, yet emoji tagging could use an explicit bullet.

accepted_hypothesis: Highlighting UI-specific cues (sidebars, emoji tags) keeps design intent visible without bloating context.
